place.name: BLACKWOOD
place.gazetteerText: BLACKWOOD, a village in the W of Monmouth; 16 miles NW of Newport. It. has a post office‡ under Newport, Monmouth, and a r. station with telegraph. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
